description.en:
1-2: Aimai na Kankei (Ambiguous Relationship)  
Satoru, a single businessman, had lived alone since high school. One rainy night, Satoru picks up a high school aged male and offers him shelter. Little does Satoru know that this high school boy might be his dream filled escapade. After all…  
  
3: Itsuwari no Daishou (False Compensation)  
When teenager Mahito sees his father and his father's secretary Kazaoka having sex, Kazaoka is sure that Mahito hates him. But then Mahito's father dies and he takes over the company and Kazaoka!  
  
4: Man On  
Oono will do anything to get Nagumo by his side.  
  
5: Kodomo Ijou Otona Miman (More Than A Kid, Less Than An Adult)  
15-year-old Kotarou still goes to his childhood pediatrician when he's sick. Does he have another motive?  
  
6: Sweet Restraint  
Atsushi's father's company is in trouble and Fukami will help, but at a cost!  
  
7-8: Miracles Don't Happen  
When Oosuga's internship is up, salaryman Andou, whom Oosuga's been lusting after, invites him to his place for the night. Oosuga is in heaven, but then Andou gives him money?!

biography.en:
**Name** (in native language)
水名瀬雅良

Living in Tokyo proper.

Likes: cats, chocolate
Dislikes: bugs

Married, has a son and a daughter.
